xml.title: MUU Flow By Date
xml.description:
This report shows the net MUU growth for Atari Mobile based on installs, reacts and quitters by date for a selected game and or client for a specified date range.
o Quitters - users who have had no activity on the mobile network for 30 days o Reacts - users who were quitters who now have activity o Installs - new users
NOTE: Quitters are shown as negative to create the MUU Flow Chart. NOTE: This report only covers users across AGH, Breakout, Circus Atari, Centipede and Outlaw.
